scripts-info.build:all: Perform all possible builds of the player (build, build:min and build:modular)
scripts-info.build:min: Build the player and minify it in dist/rx-player.min.js
scripts-info.build:modular: Build the modular build of the rx-player and create corresponding files and directories.
scripts-info.build:report: Build the player in dist/rx-player.js and display a report on its size
scripts-info.build:min:report: Build the player then minify it in dist/rx-player.min.js and display a report on its size
scripts-info.build:watch: Build the player in dist/rx-player.js each times the files update
scripts-info.check: Check validity of the src directory by running the linter and every tests
scripts-info.demo:min: Build the demo and minify it in demo/bundle.js
scripts-info.demo:watch: Build the demo in demo/bundle.js each times the files update.
scripts-info.doc: Refresh the HTML doc in doc/pages
scripts-info.info: Display the description of all npm scripts for this project
scripts-info.lint:tests: Lint source files for integration tests
scripts-info.prepare:modular: Build the base for the modular build in dist/_esm5.raw.
scripts-info.standalone: Build and launch the standalone demo on a local server (port 3941) and watch for file updates.
scripts-info.start: Build and launch the demo on a local server (port 8000) and watch for file updates.
scripts-info.test: Launch every tests in multiple browser environments
scripts-info.test:chrome: Launch every tests in a Chrome browser.
scripts-info.test:coverage: Launch every tests in multiple browser environments and build a test coverage report.
scripts-info.test:firefox: Launch every tests in a Firefox browser.
scripts-info.test:integration: Launch integration tests in multiple browser environments
scripts-info.test:integration:chrome: Launch integration tests in a Chrome browser.
scripts-info.test:integration:chrome:watch: Launch integration tests in Chrome each times the files update
scripts-info.test:integration:firefox: Launch integration tests in a Firefox browser.
scripts-info.test:integration:firefox:watch: Launch integration tests in Firefox each times the files update
scripts-info.test:integration:watch: Launch integration tests in multiple browser environments each times the files update
scripts-info.test:unit: Launch unit tests in multiple browser environments
scripts-info.test:unit:chrome: Launch unit tests in a Chrome browser.
scripts-info.test:unit:chrome:watch: Launch unit tests in Chrome each times the files update
scripts-info.test:unit:firefox: Launch unit tests in a Firefox browser.
scripts-info.test:unit:firefox:watch: Launch unit tests in Firefox each times the files update
scripts-info.test:unit:watch: Launch unit tests in multiple browser environments each times the files update
scripts-info.test:watch: Launch every tests in multiple browser environments each times the files update
scripts-info.update-version: Update the version in the codebase to what is given in argument

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:min && npm run build:modular
scripts.build:min:report: cross-env RXP_SIZE_REPORT=true cross-env RXP_MINIFY=true webpack --progress --config webpack.config.js
scripts.check: npm run types && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test:coverage: cross-env RXP_COVERAGE=true karma start tests/karma.conf.js --browsers Chrome,Firefox
scripts.test:integration:chrome:watch: cross-env RXP_TESTS_WATCH=true karma start tests/integration/karma.conf.js --browsers Chrome
scripts.test:integration:firefox:watch: cross-env RXP_TESTS_WATCH=true karma start tests/integration/karma.conf.js --browsers Firefox
scripts.test:unit:chrome:watch: cross-env RXP_TESTS_WATCH=true karma start tests/unit/karma.conf.js --browsers Chrome
scripts.test:unit:firefox:watch: cross-env RXP_TESTS_WATCH=true karma start tests/unit/karma.conf.js --browsers Firefox
